title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, goals, timeline, and resource allocation. Set up project management tools and processes.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, gather requirements from stakeholders (including remote workers, project stakeholders, and potentially domain experts), and analyze the needs of remote workers for productivity optimization. This task will inform the design and development phases of the RemoteProductivityOptimizer project.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the web application, mobile apps, backend services, data storage, and infrastructure. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Provide a high-level overview, detailed component diagrams, and discuss strategies for each component's implementation (e.g., frontend tech stack, database choices, serverless or monolithic architecture). Additionally, provide justification for the chosen approach in terms of cost, efficiency, and long-term maintainability.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models for storing user data, productivity metrics, and other relevant information. Consider normalization, scalability, and security in the design process.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interfaces for the web application and mobile apps, including responsive design and user experience optimization.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side logic, APIs, and services for data processing, productivity analysis, and integration with third-party tools.

title: DevOps and Deployment
description: Set up the continuous integration and deployment pipeline, infrastructure provisioning, and monitoring for the application.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, non-functional, and usability testing. Ensure the application meets quality standards.

title: Security Auditing and Compliance
description: Conduct security audits, implement security best practices, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and support resources for the application.
